nodes.text: A cantina was located in lower district of Actlyon City on the Outer Rim planet Actlyon around 34 ABY. Ana Tolla's crew gathered there for drinks, but quickly made their escape as a firefight broke out.
The cantina appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova as part of the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge multimedia project.
